org.obrel.space

Class FileSystemSpace<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.obrel.core.RelatedObject
      • org.obrel.space.RelationSpace<T>
        • org.obrel.space.FileSystemSpace<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Relatable, ObjectSpace<T>

    public class FileSystemSpace<T>
extends RelationSpace<T>
    An object space implementation that maps URLs to the local file system.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileSystemSpace

        public FileSystemSpace(java.lang.String sRootPath,
                       java.lang.String sDefaultFile,
                       Function<java.io.File,T> fReadFile)
        Creates a new instance.
        Parameters:
        sRootPath - The root path to which URLs are relative
        sDefaultFile - The default file to look return on empty URLs (empty string for none)
        fReadFile - A function that reads a file and returns it's content with the datatype of this space

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public T get(java.lang.String sUrl)
        Gets a value object that is referenced by a certain URL. See the method ObjectRelations.urlGet(Relatable, String) for details about this operation.
        Specified by:
        get in interface ObjectSpace<T>
        Overrides:
        get in class RelationSpace<T>
        Parameters:
        sUrl - The URL to lookup the object under
        Returns:
        The value referenced by the given URL
